entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
